about_the_game:
Everybody fights, no one quits! But above all else, customize your combat couture with the Planet X-11 themed armor set!

Includes:
Planet X-11 Armor Helmet Visor
Planet X-11 Armor Uniform
Planet X-11 HUD Nameplate
Planet X-11 Player Banner
Planet X-11 Helmet Decal
Planet X-11 Weapon Skin
